emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group, seated from left: Betty Wilkins, Joanne Butler, Junyetta Jelks, Susan Carroll; standing: supervisor Thelma Hazel, Major Ellison, Merman Austin, Alico Polk, Timothy "Tim" Stevens, and Ruth Butler, stuffing pillows in basement of Trinity AME Church
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 23, 1961, pg. 10, reads: "Gifts For Termon Home - "Stuffing tummies" may be the trend for the season, but these Trinity AME youth are stuffing animal pillows for the girls at Termon Avenue Home. Left to right, seated: Betty Wilkins, Joan Butler, Junyetta Jelks and Susan Carroll, president.  Standing: Mrs. Thelma Hazel, supervisor; Major Ellison, Merman Austin, Alico Polk, Timothy Stevens and Mrs. Ruth Butler, supervisor. - Harris Photo."
